belongs_to_collection.name: Honto ni Atta Kowai Hanashi Collection

original_title: ほんとにあった怖い話２０１２
overview: ~Honto ni Atta Kowai Hanashi~ returns with more scary tales said to be based from actual experiences. This year, five stories are told via reenactments from Yamashita Tomohisa, Okada Masaki, Karina, Goriki Ayame and Sugi-chan.
title: True Horror Stories 2012
